== Description ==

Remove a CSS file that was registered with [[Function_Reference/wp_register_style|wp_register_style()]].

== Usage ==

%%%<?php wp_deregister_style( $handle ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$handle|string|Name of the registered stylesheet.}}

== Return Values ==

; (void) : This function does not return a value.

* Since: [[Version 2.1|2.1]] (BackPress version: r79)
